author: CW33 Dallas / Ft. Worth
title: Ground News - Donate your old vehicle to Cars for Kids
text:
Summary by CW33 Dallas / Ft. Worth DALLAS (KDAF) — Cars for Kids gives local youth the chance to build a better future. CEO Colin Weatherwax stopped by the studio to chat with Stephanie Mendez about the organization's mission and impact in DFW communities. If you've got an old car taking up space in your driveway, consider donating it to Cars for Kids. Proceeds of the vehicles, sold at auction, goes to help kids in our local neighborhoods. "The kids that we service are kids that … Share menu More
